title: Wands and Wings 2: Remember, You Must
description: Tia Faylinn is finding it hard to cope with life now that she has turned thirteen. She is trying to adjust to life without her best friend, with no magical powers, and with the excitement of her first date.But life is not going to get any easier for Tia. The world is once again in great danger.Tia will have to travel through the pyramids of Egypt, stay at a very strange resort, and make a trip up a perilous mountain - all in the hope she will regain her wand and wings. She must remember she is the Queen of the Fairies. Life on Earth depends on it.
author: Jo Malizia
